divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home from a friends house at about 12:30AM.I glanced up to see a roundish cloud just above me.3 lights appeared in the center of the cloud forming a triangle.Before I had time react,I woke up walking down the middle of the road three blocks from where I seen the lights.I had no memory of seeing the lights at all.I did notice that it was 5:ooAM when I got home.This did not even register in mind at all.I had no memory of this event until three or four months later.When I started to put this all together I realized that I was missing about three hours time.To this day I cannot recall how I walked around the corner towards my house or why it took me four hours to get home when it was a 15 minute walk.This has puzzled me for over 30 years now.The last couple of years it has become more important to me and bothering me more and more.What I would like is if anyone else has had something like this happen to them and I would also like to know where the missing time went.If anyone can help,please contact me by e-mail.This actually happened so I would ask that no skeptics contact me to tell me I'm nuts.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jerome
There were no other sightings in Jerome on or around May 15th 1977
Summary: Saw 3 lights in a triangle shape and had a loss of time.
